title: Cricking Watch Cricket Scores
description: Cricket Scores! On your watch of all places! Isn't that cool?Introducing an all new version of the android cricket watch app of Cricking. It's simple. Download our watch app on your android phone. Select which matches you would like to show up on the watch dial. Get instant scores and updates. Connected. No matter where you go. Cricket like never before. Only on Cricking.For more information check out www.cricking.com or email support@cricking.com
descriptionHTML:
Cricket Scores! On your watch of all places! Isn't that cool?

Introducing an all new version of the android cricket watch app of Cricking. It's simple. Download our watch app on your android phone. Select which matches you would like to show up on the watch dial. Get instant scores and updates.

Connected. No matter where you go. Cricket like never before. Only on Cricking.

For more information check out www.cricking.com or email support@cricking.com
comments: Can't see settings icon in the app. Can't switch between analog and digital. Also, analog watch face is ugly.
Not working How the he'll does it work? I installed cricking app also but no scores. Rather I start service and each time I go back to home screen the service is stopped.
Nice idea but crashes repeatedly Doesn't work on my Sony smartwatch 3. Will keep an eye open for updates though as it's a great idea.
Does not work never finds any matches Shows no games and there is no configuration or settings to fix it or choose team etc. Waste of my time.
Great First cricket score wear app
Innovative  Idea I am the first person to download this app and writing review . And it is a great thinking from cricking . Cricking rocks again
recentChanges: - Ball by ball score updates with player scores
- Link to Cricking app on the phone
